What's New in DockFlow 1.44

Critical Bug Fix

  • macOS Compatibility Issue Resolved
    • Fixed a critical bug that was affecting some Mac users and preventing the app from functioning properly
    • Improved system compatibility across different macOS versions and hardware configurations
    • Enhanced stability for edge cases that could cause unexpected crashes

Enhanced Error Handling & Debugging

  • Advanced Error Reporting System
    • Implemented comprehensive error handling throughout the application
    • Added detailed diagnostic reporting to help identify and resolve issues faster
    • Enhanced crash reporting with better context information for quicker bug fixes
    • Improved user feedback when errors occur, with clearer explanations and suggested solutions

Thank You!

This update prioritizes stability and reliability for all users. The enhanced error reporting will help us provide even faster support and fixes in the future. We appreciate your patience and continued feedback!
